short_description: This function computes approximate percentiles for one or more columns of data.
long_description: This function computes approximate percentiles for one or more columns of data.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the input data.

argument_clauses.name: Percentile
argument_clauses.description: A comma separated list of double values that specifies which approximate percentiles you wish to compute. Each input value must be no less than 0.0 and no greater than 100.0. The default value is [0.0, 25.0, 50.0, 75.0, 100.0].

argument_clauses.name: GroupColumns
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the columns to group the data by.
